ParentAttr
The function is designed to add an attribute value of the parent type to the filtering algorithm.
The function is used in
algorithms
of the
"Algorithm. Filtering condition to select items"
type.
Syntax
attr
Setting
Purpose
attr
The selected attribute or its ID.
Note
Before working with the
parentAttr
function, specify the parent type in the "Object form with parameters to be used for filter (parent object)" field.
Then  save the algorithm card by clicking on the
button, after which the attributes of this type will become available for insertion into the algorithm code.
The function is called from the
"Sources"
tab on the toolbar of the algorithm editor, which opens a modal window for selecting an attribute with the ability to specify the attribute type.
To insert a chain attribute, open the nested list of the object attribute.
The "Specify attribute type" option defines how to work with attributes of a child object type. This feature is active after selecting an object attribute. The action of the attribute is similar to working with the
attr
function.
Use example
For example, it is required to filter the list of cities based on the country selected by the user.
To do this, in the filtering algorithm profile, specify the "City" object type in the "Object type with elements to be filtered" field, as well as the parent "Country" type in the corresponding field.
The algorithm can be as follows:
The attribute of the filtered type is selected by the
attr
function, the attribute of the parent type is selected by the
parentAttr
function.
